536850.name: POLYCRUSHER - Soundtrack
536850.description:
This is the POLYCRUSHER soundtrack and Pascal Moschina is the world traveling humanoid composer of that very score. In the process of creating this musical polytimbre, the polygonal dimension, where the Polynauts dwell, engulfed his being and transformed his physis into a topology of entwined spacevectors, forming a mango-pascalese polygonal entity. Listen to it and the fog will clear.

Tracklist:

1 - Crush'em All

2 - Distorted Reality
3 - Time To Kill
4 - Arcadekaze
5 - Herds of Nerds
6 - Blood
7 - Angstflucht
8 - Dumb Bit Terror
9 - Overdose
536850.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
